body:
i wanna analysis how is the wind move in the certain form of building.  therefore, i try to use the honeybee to analyze natural ventilation. i just download the example from the website.

but here is the output. it seems to not work .

could someone to help me out?

thanks in advanced.

replies.body:
it seems that every simulation has the same problem. i can't get any thing from the analysis.

so sad
Have you tried to run it with a different weather file? As you can see in EnergyPlus error report there is an issue with the weather file.

Also, Keisei.  Keep in mind that all of the ventilation example files up on hydra are presently using simple, easy-to-compute approximations of wind/buoyancy-driven airflow to understand the thermal conditions inside buildings.  Modeling airflow and air speeds in detail is much more complex, takes a lot of fluid dynamics expertise, and would likely require a computational fluid dynamics (CFD) software package.
